Text: RE Lawyerdo I need to do to move this thing forward I suspect that the problem is basically with the lawyers They only know how to stop things but in a way they play a role in global society If it were not for the handicaps they lay on us the rest of the world would never have a chance Original Message From To Cc Sent PM Subject Re Lawyer Ian Sorry for a delay in getting back to you I have one challenge I did not anticipate when I talked to you the first time about our Real Options internal seminar The materials were prepared in collaboration with a professor from another school and there is some sensitivity regarding the intellectual property rights and the ability to distribute the materials outside Enron Please give me some time to find out if I can work around this issue Vince MacMillan Ian on AM To cc Subject Lawyer I still have not heard from your lawyer I would like to see whar materials you are using and assess how we could work on the topic of real options with Enron

RE Lawyerwill sign an agreement not to use the materials Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday March AM To Cc Subject Re Lawyer Ian Sorry for a delay in getting back to you I have one challenge I did not anticipate when I talked to you the first time about our Real Options internal seminar The materials were prepared in collaboration with a professor from another school and there is some sensitivity regarding the intellectual property rights and the ability to distribute the materials outside Enron Please give me some time to find out if I can work around this issue Vince MacMillan Ian on AM To cc Subject Lawyer I still have not heard from your lawyer I would like to see whar materials you are using and assess how we could work on the topic of real options with Enron
Strategic Management Society conference Cc was accepted Dust off your San Francisco shoes Rita McGrath the designer of our particular panel will forward details when they are sent to her by SMS

RE Lawyerto hear this I have generally shared my materials with colleagues Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday March AM To Cc Subject RE Lawyer Ian Sorry for a delay in responding to you I am currently in London flying back to Houston tomorrow The problem is not with the lawyers We worked on our presentation materials together with a professor from another university and we agreed to use these materials only internally We have to honor our commitment to him I am sure that this is exactly what you would have expected from us if we had made a similar commitment to you Vince MacMillan Ian on PM To cc Subject RE Lawyer What do I need to do to move this thing forward I suspect that the problem is basically with the lawyers They only know how to stop things but in a way they play a role in global society If it were not for the handicaps they lay on us the rest of the world would never have a chance Original Message From To Cc Sent PM Subject Re Lawyer Ian Sorry for a delay in getting back to you I have one challenge I did not anticipate when I talked to you the first time about our Real Options internal seminar The materials were prepared in collaboration with a professor from another school and there is some sensitivity regarding the intellectual property rights and the ability to distribute the materials outside Enron Please give me some time to find out if I can work around this issue Vince MacMillan Ian on AM To cc Subject Lawyer I still have not heard from your lawyer I would like to see whar materials you are using and assess how we could work on the topic of real options with Enron

RE Strategic Management Society ConferenceVince i will get the details to Shirley Unfortunately I am in Asia next week Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday June AM To Cc Subject RE Strategic Management Society Conference Ian I shall come to Wharton on Thursday June meeting with Howard Kunreuther I shall ask my assistant to forward you my itinerary I shall also register for the October Conference Thanks for reminding me Vince Original Message From MacMillan Ian ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESMacMillanCIanCmacmilliwhartonEupennEeduE NRONcom Sent Tuesday June AM To Cc Rita Mcgrath Email Boisot Max Subject Strategic Management Society Conference A couple of months ago you agreed to serve on a panel on real options that Rita McGrath at Columbia had assembled We have been informed that you have not registered for the conference in SFO October to Can you please register they are getting antsy about it Go to When are you due at Wharton again

Strategic Management Society Conference Cc of months ago you agreed to serve on a panel on real options that Rita McGrath at Columbia had assembled We have been informed that you have not registered for the conference in SFO October to Can you please register they are getting antsy about it Go to When are you due at Wharton again

RE dinner invitation Cc I think the easiest would be to have him pick up your name badge and say that he is subbing for you and get the name changed Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday October PM To Subject RE dinner invitation Mac Zimin will be definitely coming Vince Original Message From MacMillan Ian ENRON Sent Wednesday October PM To Kaminski Vince J Subject RE dinner invitation Vince this is terrible news I paid a registration fee out of my research budget to get you registered this was nonrefundable I hope that I can get Mr Lu substituted Can you please confirm that Mr Lu will be coming if we can arrange a substitution Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday October PM To Subject RE dinner invitation Mac Greeting from Brazil Thanks for the invitation Unfortunately I had to cancel my participation at the conference My associate Zimin Lu who has an extensive experience in modeling real options will go the conference in my place and he can participate in the panel discussion if its OK with you Vince Original Message From MacMillan Ian ENRON Sent Wednesday October AM To Subject FW dinner invitation Sorry I meant Tuesday October rd Monday is the grand dinner Original Message From MacMillan Ian Sent Monday October PM To Subject dinner invitation Dear Vince I would like to invite you to join me for dinner on October at We will be joined by other respected scholars attending the Strategic Management Conference We will be dinning at The Stinking Rose on North Beach Please let me know if you are able to attend Many thanks Mac This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

FW dinner invitationSorry I meant Tuesday October rd Monday is the grand dinner Original Message From MacMillan Ian Sent Monday October PM To Subject dinner invitation Dear Vince I would like to invite you to join me for dinner on October at We will be joined by other respected scholars attending the Strategic Management Conference We will be dinning at The Stinking Rose on North Beach Please let me know if you are able to attend Many thanks Mac

dinner invitationDear Vince I would like to invite you to join me for dinner on October at We will be joined by other respected scholars attending the Strategic Management Conference We will be dinning at The Stinking Rose on North Beach Please let me know if you are able to attend Many thanks Mac

presentation in san francisco Cc Hi Vince As the SFO conference draws near we are gearing up for the panel session Rita McGrath at Columbia is the chair There are four presenters of which you will be the representative from practice The others are Rita Max Boisot of ESADE in Spain and I We would like for you to talk for minutes on the major and most successful applications of real options at Enron I think the greatest impact will take place if we finishwith you because of the practical implications of your talk for the attendees there are usually about academics and practiotioners at the conference though we will be in smaler rooms due to the fact that there are multiple simultaneous presentations The conference is at the Westin St Francis

RE dinner invitationDoes Zimin want to attend the dir on Tuesday night the presentation is on Monday at in the Oxford Room of the Westin St Francis Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday October PM To Subject RE dinner invitation Mac Zimin will be definitely coming Vince Original Message From MacMillan Ian ENRON Sent Wednesday October PM To Kaminski Vince J Subject RE dinner invitation Vince this is terrible news I paid a registration fee out of my research budget to get you registered this was nonrefundable I hope that I can get Mr Lu substituted Can you please confirm that Mr Lu will be
